game.name: SAD GOD
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: SAD GOD is a platformer-shooter-roguelike. We invite you to descend into a pit of monsters and traps. Gain strength from coins and weapons from altars. Touch an orb. Then race to the surface before the lava gets you.
